response.overview: This world class Homecoming event brings together the very best of country, bluegrass and gospel music in an unforgettable celebration of faith. From seasoned hall-of-famers to young up-and-comers, this Country Bluegrass Homecoming is packed with brilliant and inspiring performances by artists who got their start singing in church.  Includes:  Jesus And John Wayne, Will He Wait A Little Longer, Place On Calvary, There's A Rainbow At The End Of Every Storm,  Did You Forget God Today, Climbing Up The Mountain, I Heard My Savior Calling Me, Love Was In The Room, Jesus Walks Ahead Of Me, Time Has Made A Change, Just A Little Talk With Jesus, Barbie Bandaids, I Am The Man Thomas, Mercy Walked In, Help Me Lord, I Believe, Just A Closer Walk With Thee, By The Mark, The Unseen Hand, Tell Me One More Time About Jesus, I Need Thee Every Hour
response.title: Country Bluegrass Homecoming Volume 2
